original_title: Boogie Woogie Bugle Boy of Company "B"
overview: Hot Breath Harry is a hot trumpeter at a jazz club. He finds himself drafted into the Army, where he's assigned to be the bugler of an African-American company. But everyone hates the bugler, because he blows reveille at the ungodly hour of 5 AM sharp.
title: Boogie Woogie Bugle Boy of Company "B"
